name: Benji's Boat
description:
Welcome to Benji's Boat, balance your cargo against the terrible waves and avoid obstacles on the sea!

Controls:

  •  Drag and drop the cargo to restore balance
  •  Use the keyboard arrows to change direction

Team:

  • Asencio Florian - Game Designer
  • Caron Philémon - Environment Artist
  • Delemotte Martin - Game Designer
  • Hollebecq Baptiste - Developer
  • Leclercq Guillaume - Technical Artist
  • Loosdregt Margot - Environment Artist
  • Salembier Victor - Game Designer
